titleStmt.title: The newe testamente both Latine and Englyshe ech correspondent to the other after the vulgare texte, communely called S. Ieroms. Faythfully translated by Myles Couerdale. Anno. M.CCCCC.XXXVIII.

titleStmt.title: The newe testamente both Latine and Englyshe ech correspondent to the other after the vulgare texte, communely called S. Ieroms. Faythfully translated by Myles Couerdale. Anno. M.CCCCC.XXXVIII.
Bible. N.T. Latin. Vulgate.
titleStmt.author: Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iames Nicholson. Set forth wyth the Kynges moost gracious licence,

notesStmt.note: English and Latin in parallel columns.
The calendar is printed partly in red.
This edition has, on leaf 40 lines 13-14, "before #5FD\ the cock synge".
This edition repudiated by Coverdale on account of the faulty printing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Iames Nicholson. Set forth wyth the Kynges moost gracious licence
